ygData.subject: Re: Anachronox
ygData.msgSnippet: Belthassan: Take it easy, friend. You are a new being in this universe, it is normal. If you want, you can become one of us, a Tripredacus. How do you feel?

Belthassan: Take it easy, friend. You are a new being in this 
universe, it is normal. If you want, you can become one of us, a 
Tripredacus. How do you feel? What do you think about this?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Anachronox --
> 
> Anachronox thinks for a sec, "I, I don't know where i'm from, or how 
> I arrived here. Is this some sort of trick?" He finishes with a 
> confused growl. "I can't remember doing anything or... anything!"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Belthassan, not being stupid, realizes something went wrong. He 
> takes 
> > Anachronox's hand and shakes it, but he does so absent-mindingly.
> > 
> > Belthassan: Tell me, Anachronox, where are you from? How did you 
> > arrive here?
> > 
> > If what he thought was right, he had been created by the Renewal 
> > Chamber itself, from Firedrill. Daemos would have to deal with all 
> the 
> > diplomatic problems that would come from this...
